current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit the use of Federal funds for certain
		  activities of the National Labor Relations Board and the Consumer Financial
		  Protection Bureau.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Health, Education, Labor,
			 and Pensions

cosponsor.#tail:

			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Restoring the Constitutional
			 Balance of Power Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to undertake or enforce activities commencing on or after
			 January 4, 2012 that require authorization by not less than a quorum of the
			 members of the

text.#text: No Federal funds may be used by the

header.#text:
Prohibition on
			 funding of certain NLRB activities

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:

text.#text: No funds may be transferred from the

header.#text:
Prohibition on
			 funding of certain CFPB activities

text.#text:
The provisions of this Act shall terminate
			 on the date on which—

			 Columbia Circuit in the case Noel Canning v. National Labor Relations Board
			 (No. 12–1115); and
